desc: This book constitutes the proceedings of the 19th International Conference on Speech and Computer, SPECOM 2017, held in Hatfield, UK, in September 2017.

details.authors: Alexey Karpov (Editor),‎ Rodmonga Potapova (Editor),‎ Iosif Mporas (Editor)

title: Speech and Computer: 19th International Conference, SPECOM 2017
